meanings.sent1: The ridgelings in the landscape added beauty to the scenery.
meanings.sent2: The hikers marveled at the tiny ridgelings along the path.
meanings.sent3: The ridgelings on the hill seemed to be playing hide and seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: The ridgelings of the mountain stood proudly against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The ridgelings resembled gentle waves frozen in time.

meanings.definition: A person or animal living on a ridge.
meanings.sent1: The ridgelings built their homes on the highest points for safety.
meanings.sent2: The village of ridgelings overlooked the valley below.
meanings.sent3: The ridgelings had a bird's eye view of the entire forest.
meanings.sent4: The ridgelings were like guardians of the mountain, watching over all below.
meanings.sent5: The ridgelings' homes perched on the ridge like crowns on their heads.
